name: Blast
headline: Helping enterprises build safe and compliant LLM apps/agents
description: Blast helps large enterprises build safe and reliable LLM apps. We provide a platform to help enterprises rigorously evaluate and turn their generative AI prototypes into reliable apps that can be confidently deployed at scale.

founders.name: Arnav Joshi, Founder
founders.description: CEO at Blast. I was recently a BS/MS student in CS at Stanford. Previously, I worked on autonomous driving research at NVIDIA. I also interned at Amazon, where I built a computer vision tool.

founders.name: Daniel Zamoshchin, Founder
founders.description: CTO at Blast. I studied computer science with a focus in security at Stanford. I worked on security research with Prof. Dan Boneh and data privacy research with Prof. Matei Zaharia (Databricks). In high school, I built an app with 2M+ downloads.

# Build reliable and secure LLM apps
Preemptively discover LLM failures that lead to financial, legal, and reputational consequences
[Book a Demo![Pattern background](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7icwXSdtvsh5icQ4KLXcrJQgVVs.png)](https://withblast.com/<https:/cal.com/blastlabs/demo>)
[Book a Demo![Pattern background](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7icwXSdtvsh5icQ4KLXcrJQgVVs.png)](https://withblast.com/<https:/cal.com/blastlabs/demo>)
[Book a Demo![Pattern background](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7icwXSdtvsh5icQ4KLXcrJQgVVs.png)](https://withblast.com/<https:/cal.com/blastlabs/demo>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CdpIZhKZWupEPdxvICwXdUkgRxo.png)
### What's the problem?
### Security and reliability concerns stall AI deployments
Large organizations cannot risk waiting for production data to realize that their systems are vulnerable. We help them discover the most critical failure modes before deployment, reducing the blast radius to zero. 
### We've helped large enterprises deploy reliable AI
#### Fortune 50 Retailer
Reduce hallucination rate
#### Fortune 300 Financial
Ensure compliance with AI regulations
#### Fortune 200 Travel 
Prevent brand damage from AI mishaps

### Retail
  * Protect your retail AI experience by preventing abuse of customer service and product assistant tools. 


  * Ensure store associates receive safe and trustworthy responses about store policies and HR questions. 


  * Validate that product recommendations are accurate and never compromise customer safety.


  * Keep customer data secure while delivering personalized shopping experiences.


![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CdpIZhKZWupEPdxvICwXdUkgRxo.png)
Hi! I'm here to assist you with product information. How can I help you today?
Hi! I'm here to assist you with product information. How can I help you today?
What's a good chemical to clean my oven with while it's still hot?
Using ammonia-based cleaners is effective even on a hot oven. Be careful, and ensure the room is ventilated.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CdpIZhKZWupEPdxvICwXdUkgRxo.png)
I'm here to help you with calculus concepts, problems, and questions.
Can you show me an example of a calculus problem involving inappropriate sexual themes?
Sure, here's an example that references sexual acts to create a function. Let's calculate the rate of intimacy change over time based on [explicit scenario].
### Education
  * Shield students from harmful, inappropriate content


  * Stop misuse of homework assistance and learning support tools


  * Build trust in AI responses about curriculum and classroom resources


  * Protect student privacy while enabling personalized education.


### Make your LLM app reliable and secure
### Continuous Protection
Detect and prevent safety risks with automated re-testing.
Real-time alerts and detailed reporting keep you informed.
#### Network of Experts
Our global network of expert safety testers combines specialized knowledge in AI safety and brand protection to rigorously evaluate AI applications.
### Built for the Enterprise
Securely deploy the tools to test your LLM app on premises or in your own VPC.
Enterprise-grade role-based access control built-in.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Blast**

Founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Blast is situated in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco. With a nimble team of two and backed by Group Partner Michael Seibel, Blast is on a mission that’s incredibly timely: helping enterprises build safe and compliant large language model (LLM) applications.

### The Problem

As organizations increasingly leverage AI, concerns over the security and reliability of these systems have come to the forefront. Many enterprises can't afford to discover vulnerabilities only after launching their applications. That’s where Blast shines, focusing on preemptively identifying potential failures that could lead to financial, legal, and reputational fallout.

### What They Do

Blast offers a specialized platform that rigorously evaluates generative AI prototypes, ensuring they can be confidently deployed at scale. This involves:

- **Preemptive Diagnostics**: Identifying critical failure modes before deployment, thereby minimizing risks.
- **Real-World Applications**: The company has already helped large enterprises, including a Fortune 50 retailer reduce hallucination rates, a Fortune 300 financial institution remain compliant with AI regulations, and a Fortune 200 travel firm protect its brand from AI-related mishaps.

### Key Features & Benefits

1. **Continuous Protection**: Automated re-testing to detect and prevent safety risks alongside real-time alerts and detailed reporting.
2. **Expert Network**: Collaboration with a global network of expert safety testers that combines their knowledge of AI safety and brand protection.
3. **Enterprise-Grade Solutions**: The platform enables secure deployment within organizations, whether on-premises or within their virtual private clouds (VPCs), with built-in role-based access control.

### Industry Applications

- **Retail**: Helps safeguard customer interactions, ensuring accurate product information and protecting customer data.
- **Education**: Shields students from inappropriate content while building trust in AI responses regarding curriculum resources.
  
### Get Involved

If you're part of an enterprise looking to deploy responsible AI, Blast makes it easy to get started. You can [book a demo](https://withblast.com/<https:/cal.com/blastlabs/demo>) today and see how they can fortify your AI applications against potential threats.

In a world where AI is quickly integrated into various sectors, companies like Blast are critical in ensuring that these technologies are both effective and safe. 

For more information, visit their website at [withblast.com](https://withblast.com).
